position.marginalia_text: Vultu, voce, gestu; omni parte absolutus vir:

marginalia.translation: In expression, voice, and gesture: in all parts the man is absolute:

position.marginalia_text: Omnium horarum vsurarius. Minutorum Calculator Scrupulosus.

marginalia.translation: It is useful for all hours. A scrupulous calculator of minutiae.

position.marginalia_text: Scitum est, nonnulla magna officiosè dicere; pla[e]raq[ue] omnia parua profundè iudicare. Magna Sunt, qua[e] hodiè pollent in Mundo; et in posterum ingentia existimabuntur.

marginalia.translation: It is known that he says several great things attentively, and that he judges profoundly the majority of all small things. Great are the things which are strong in the world today and the vast things which will be estimated thereafter.

position.marginalia_text: Ingenij est, singula redigere ad sua puncta analyticè: aut ad insignes sententias aphoristicè. Nuda magis patent: pressa plus valent. Extrà pra[e]scriptos limites vagari, non ire, sed errare est.

marginalia.translation: It becomes the intellect to reduce singular things to their points analytically or to distinguished maxims aphoristically. Bare things are more accessible; compressed things are worth more. To wander beyond prescribed limits is not to advance, but to err.
